title: Time Sensitive on Snapchat: iOS Notification Feature Explained

steps.title: iOS may label your Snapchat notifications as Time Sensitive.
steps.content: iOS may label your Snapchat notifications as Time Sensitive. This simply acts as a reminder to respond to your Snap messages when you have Do Not Disturb or another Focus mode enabled. iPhones and iPads running iOS 15 or later have this feature to stay on top of time-sensitive events. While this is helpful for other apps like Find My or Lyft, it may be considered spammy if you don't need or want reminders to use a social media app. You can easily disable this feature in your settings.

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Notifications.
steps.content: Tap Notifications . You can find this above Sounds & Haptics .

steps.title: Tap Snapchat.
steps.content: Tap Snapchat . This will be in the app list. You may need to scroll down to find it.

steps.title: Toggle off "Time Sensitive Notifications".
steps.content: Toggle off "Time Sensitive Notifications". This is next to a clock icon. Alternatively, you can toggle off Allow Notifications to stop all notifications entirely.
